ambition.question: Did I allow my desire for power and dominance to influence how I interact with others, particularly those in positions of authority or responsibility?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: by exercising unjust authority over them , disregarding their God - given dignity
oppression.question: Did I mistreat, harass, or discriminate against others by exercising unjust authority over them, disregarding their God-given dignity?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: through my words , actions , or decisions
oppression.question: Did I unjustly dominate or coerce others through my words, actions, or decisions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: in my interactions with others , particularly those in positions of authority , such as supervisors , coaches , or leaders
with others , particularly those in positions of authority , such as supervisors , coaches , or leaders
in positions of authority , such as supervisors , coaches , or leaders
of authority , such as supervisors , coaches , or leaders
such as supervisors , coaches , or leaders
oppression.question: Have I, in my interactions with others, particularly those in positions of authority, such as supervisors, coaches, or leaders, mistreated them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: solely to your own efforts and self - reliance
autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence, leading you to attribute success solely to your own efforts and self-reliance?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the achievements and success in my career, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that were hurtful , derogatory , or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others with words that were hurtful, derogatory, or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use words to disrespect others, violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that was hurtful or demeaning
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in my words, speaking to others in a way that was hurtful or demeaning?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

to a lack of self - control and an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, leading to a lack of self-control and an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable in my daily life
beyond what is reasonable in my daily life
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable in my daily life?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when engaging in social gatherings or enjoying leisure activities?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing faults or private affairs of acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing faults or private affairs of acquaintances, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my colleagues ' shortcomings or private lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my colleagues' shortcomings or private lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my thoughts rather than seeking reconciliation when disagreements arose with family, friends, or colleagues?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

impurity.question: Did you intentionally use practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did you use certain practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did I use certain practices, substances, or objects to deliberately prevent pregnancy within my marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
